sen.j: 中村雀右衛門（なかむら じゃくえもん）は、歌舞伎役者の名跡の一つ。
sen.e: Jakuemon NAKAMURA is a professional name for a kabuki actor.
Jakuemon NAKAMURA is a Kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors) actor's professional name.
Jakuemon NAKAMURA is a Kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors) actor's professional name.
His stage family name is Kyoya.
The stage family name is Kyoya.
The stage family name is Kyoya.
The present is the forth.
The present is the fourth.
The present is the fourth.

sen.j: 定紋は京屋結び、替紋は向い雀。
sen.e: His jomon (family crest) is Kyoya Musubi, Mukai Suzume.
sen.cmt: 「向い雀」は正確には「替紋」のようですが、原文通りにしました。
sen.e: The Jomon (family crest) is Kyoya Musubi (literally, Kyoya's knot) and the Kaemon (alternate personal crest) is Mukai Suzume (literally, two opposite sparrows).
sen.cmt: ウェブより「替紋は」を原文補足し、表現を合わせ、用語補足しました。
sen.e: The Jomon (family crest) is Kyoya Musubi (literally, Kyoya's knot) and the Kaemon (alternate personal crest) is Mukai Suzume (literally, two opposite sparrows).
His stage family name was Edoya.
The stage family name was Edoya.
The stage family name was Edoya.
His haimyo (a.k.a. Haimei) (a pen name as a haiku poet, as well as a kabuki actor's offstage name which can be used officially and privately) was 芝斗.
His haimyo (also known as haimei, a kabuki actor's offstage name which can be used officially and privately) was Shibato (芝斗).
sen.cmt: 表現を合わせ、想定できる読みを補足しました。
sen.e: His haimyo (also known as haimei, a kabuki actor's offstage name which can be used officially and privately) was Shibato (芝斗).
He had previously been called Shibazo NAKAMURA, the first.
Former the first Shibazo NAKAMURA (中村芝蔵).
sen.cmt: 表現を変え、想定できる読みを補足しました。
sen.e: Former the first Shibazo NAKAMURA (中村芝蔵).
His stage family name was Kyoya.
The stage family name was Kyoya.
The stage family name was Kyoya.
His haimyo was芝斗, Umezu.
His haimyo was Shibato and Umezu.
sen.cmt: 前出用語に合わせました。
sen.e: His haimyo was Shibato and Umezu.

sen.j: 元2代目中村芝蔵、2代目中村芝雀。
sen.e: He had formerly been called Shibazo NAKAMURA, the second, and Shibajaku NAKAMURA, the second.
Former the second Shibazo NAKAMURA and the second Shibajaku NAKAMURA.
Former the second Shibazo NAKAMURA and the second Shibajaku NAKAMURA.
He was a son of Risho ARASHI.
He was a son of Risho ARASHI.
He was a son of Risho ARASHI.
His stage family name was Kyoya.
The stage family name was Kyoya.
The stage family name was Kyoya.
His haimyo was Umezu, 芝斗.
His haimyo was Umezu and Shibato.
sen.cmt: 前出用語に合わせました。
sen.e: His haimyo was Umezu and Shibato.
He had formerly been called Shibajaku NAKAMURA, the forth.
Former the fourth Shibajaku NAKAMURA.
Former the fourth Shibajaku NAKAMURA.

tit.cmt: スペル修正、原文に合わせました。

sen.j: - 大谷友右衛門 (6代目)の長男。
sen.e: He is the eldest son of Tomoemon OTANI, the sixth.
He is the oldest son of Tomoemon OTANI (the sixth).
sen.cmt: 統一リストに合わせました。
sen.e: He is the oldest son of Tomoemon OTANI (the sixth).

sen.j: 大谷広太郎、元7代目大谷友右衛門。
sen.e: He was formerly named Hirotaro OTANI, and then Tomoemon OTANI the seventh.
sen.cmt: 「彼は以前は大谷広太郎、その後7代目大谷友右衛門という名だった。」と解釈して訳しました。
sen.e: Hirotaro OTANI and former the seventh Tomoemon OTANI.
Hirotaro OTANI and former the seventh Tomoemon OTANI.
